name: Burnie's Day Out
description:
Join Burnie on his relaxing day off at the snow! Nothing could possible go wro- AN AVALANCHE?!

Burnie must survive the avalanche, collecting enough fresh wood to keep his fire burning. A game with multiple endings depending on what you do, or do not, burn. 

Snowy trees burn into bare trees at 1600+, Bare trees at 1100+. As for the bridge? Forget I said anything.

Controls:

WASD/Arrows: Move Burnie

Made for GameJam 124: Warmth

Piano Music used by Ghosthvck
